txt.en: 'What's in a name? Some folks think that they hold power, some think that you can just choose your own. I've seen some ridiculous names in my time and that's not including all the Elves that I have been forced to deal with. Fortunately, the Captain-Generals are better at working out titles. \n\n'In their wisdom they have given me leave to bestow new honourifics on the deserving. You take a look at them and let me know which one you would like.'
'Looks like you have come back to make a decision. So, what is it going to be?'
Veterans of the Battle of the Ettenmoors in Name...At Least

As a reward for the efforts of the most recognized, noble and persistent in the Ettenmoors, the Captain-Generals have commissioned new monnikers to be bestowed on all who have achieved the rank of Lieutenant and better.
Speak to Ash at Gl√¢n Vraig
Speak with Quartermaster Ash again and choose your reward for your continued efforts in the Ettenmoors.
You must choose your reward before 11/1/11
